Doggo & Catto Angels

Welcome to pet paradise!!!

Get acquainted with all the angels as well as know more about them.

Doggos

Bella

She is a Alaska Malamute, she was adopted from 4 months old, she has a gentle nature but is extremely active.

Holly

With the personality of a German Shepherd, although he looks gentle on the outside, he is really a real boss, has a strict personality, and is very disciplined.

Charlie

This is Bella's best friend, the two of them have been together since childhood, and now they cannot be separated

Rosie

A legendary Samoyed princess really came out in life, she was extremely gentle in every action, never doing anything too much, always enjoying life in the lightest way.

Cattos

Tilly

As the only adult boy in the pack, but it looks like he doesn't care about his surroundings. He really lives up to his breed, British Longhair, what a lazy boy!

Lola

She is the biggest in the group, but don't be afraid of her because of her appearance, she loves people, and everybody can cuddle her.

Daisy

For 5 consecutive years voted as the most luxurious cat in the group, every time she walks, everyone has to look up

Luna

Another girl in cast iron, she is Siberian cat, she loves to play outdoors, and occasionally gives us little birds and mice, what a treat!!

Kittens and Puppies

Coco, Momo, and Fofo

The trio is only 3 months old, and all three are girls, with their presence we hope they will make our coffee store has more diverse in personality..

Millie and Lillie

We just got them earlier this year, this is really a challenge for them, because here the climate is very different from where they were born, China..

Phoebe

This handsome creature promises to be a good boy in the future, he looks like he has a lot of potential to become a leader.

Teddy

Charlie's son is now 6 months old, and he looks just as cute as his father.
